meanings.sent1: The heat in the room was insufferable, making it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent2: The insufferable pain in her leg made it difficult for her to walk.
meanings.sent3: The insufferable noise of the construction work next door kept him up all night.
meanings.sent4: The insufferable weight of grief felt like a heavy burden on her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The insufferable smell coming from the garbage bin made everyone hold their noses.

meanings.sent1: His insufferable attitude towards others made him very unpopular.
meanings.sent2: She found his insufferable boasting about his achievements tiresome.
meanings.sent3: The insufferable way he always had to be right annoyed everyone in the group.
meanings.sent4: Her insufferable sense of superiority made it hard for others to connect with her.
meanings.sent5: The insufferable smirk on his face showed his arrogance to everyone around him.
